caption: A male vocalist sings this high spirited Portugal song. The tempo is fast with keyboard harmony, punchy drumming, groovy bass lines, animated trumpets, backed with harmonica, party whistles, lively vocalisation and vocal backup, tambourine beats and congas. This song is a sonic treat with a plethora of instruments in perfect sync and harmony. It is happy, joyful and merry with a dance groove.
